headline.main: JAPANESE REPELLED IN SHANTUNG PROVINCE; Chinese Report Over 1,000 Killed or Wounded in 4 Days

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, May 2 (AP) -- A Chinese High Command communique said today more than 1,000 Japanese troops had been killed or wounded in four days of fighting last month during a renewed effort of the invaders to clear out Chinese positions in Shantung Province north of the railroad between Tsinan and the Yellow Sea port of Tsingtao.
abstract: Chinese rept Japanese sustain heavy losses in 4-day battle to clear out Chinese positions, Shantung Prov north of rr between Tsinan and Tsingtao; Japanese continue attacks against Taiheng Mts
